title: The Ross Mathematics Program — My Experience
summary: What I did at Ross, what Ross gave to me, and how Ross changed my life.

body.raw:
![Ross/Ohio 2023 Group Photo](/static/images/ross-2023.jpeg)

- I live-TeX'ed notes, used by Bergelson for the final compilation :smiley: (I learned a _lot_ of higher math)
    - spectral graph theory
    - the multifarious Cantor set
    - hypergeometric functions
    - measure theory
    - real analysis
    - point-set topology
    - game theory / auction theory (the dead game theorist's group)
    - abstract algebra (group theory, ring theory, field theory)
    - modal logic, Suslin trees, back and forth argument
    - ordinal collapsing functions (ordinals & set theory)
- I attended advanced lectures and the "What is?" seminar
    - "What is?" gang: Pico, Agniv, me, Benjamin, Xinkai, Gene, Stella
    - Target binge-buying after "What is?" lmaooo (always >$200 flex)
    - Gyro place, Korean restaurant, Chinese restaurant, fun dinners
- I self-studied complex analysis (YouTube lectures by Petra Bonfert-Taylor, _Complex Analysis_ by Serge Lang, and _Visual Complex Functions_ by Elias Wegert)
- I made lots of friends (there's apparently a jiwu fan club lmao)
- I met Emma :heart:
    - just sooo cute & kind & smart & majestic & perfect \<3
    - "百五十AMC我操" - Pico, yelling at Emma for the 100th time
    - ice cream w/ Emma (brought by Pico or Xinkai) (Whit's)
    - late night ice cream at 10pm w/ Pico, Emma, and all the Towers after Hours gang (Graeter's)
    - Emma's grinding week (week 4) - 10 sets (Set \#10 to Set \#19) in 4 days actually so crazyyyy
- I played cards (team golf, doudizhu, individual golf) w/ Pico and Emma (every night, 12-5am)
- I played Chinese Avalon (the fun nights, ah)
    - I learned _some_ questionable Chinese: 我操, 我真笨, 一百五十AMC我操, 我是Percival, 我通了, ...
- I visited OSU (number garden), took a bunch of photos w/ friends
    - subway food was so shitttt (was sick for like 3 days straight after eating that sandwich from a place with not very good hygiene)
- I played some frisbee
- I met a bunch of extremely smart people (Jacob, Agniv, Pico, Jason, Emma, ...)
    - mr Jason wang - godly at chess (Chess IM, i.e., FIDE Rating >2750), the best roommate I could imagine, casual USAPhO grinder, casually calls his girlfriend for >4 hours
    - my bro Agniv - goes to Proof, is really smart and cool, does fencing, "What is?" gang
    - Jacob - our family (fam 3 forever :heart:), knows insane amount of math, fellow linguistics fan (NACLO top 13)
    - Pico - just Pico, went to Proof, was a counselor last year (as a rising senior wtf), just graduated from Proof (goes to UCSB this year), and insaneeeeeeeeeely smart
    - Emma - 一百五十AMC我操 (speaks for itself), and all the compliments I could ever imagine of....
